Hello!

I've created a Patreon crowdfunding page for my award-winning text adventure games at http://patreon.com/robinjohnson
A small donation a month can help me make more games and get paid for the work I love, and also feed my cat. She says thanks.
The games themselves will remain free to play, here and at http://versificator.net

Share and Enjoy!
